name: Jago Szabó
description: Jago was born as Jagoda Szabó inBudapest,Hungary. That same year, Jago's family moved toNight City. He transitioned at some point afterwards. In2066, he was sentenced to prison for embezzling corporate funds ofPetrochemand was released for good behavior in2068. During the next years, Jago worked in Night City's underworld. In2072he helped lay the foundations ofBarghest, becoming one of its top-ranking members due to his corporate skills and connections in the smuggling trade.
